short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce Deployment Helper - This Extension will display the deployment results for components deployed via Metadata API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currently Salesforce does not display the details about components being deployed via metadata api. This plugin override the standard deployment status and display a more sophisticated 360 overview of the deployment results.
